function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Challenges with social distancing in highly urbanized counties due to shared green spaces","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weaker association between forest coverage and infection rate in rural counties due to private properties","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Forest may be more effective in removing ambient pollutants than other green spaces.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tree canopies creating a more comfortable microclimate in forest areas.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using satellite imagery data without proper validation or ground truthing","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Proximity to forest increasing infection rate","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Local park area as a potential transmission hotspot","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate isolation of people with suspected respiratory tract infections","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmission of sars epidemic in china, singapore, and vietnam in 2003","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Abnormal concentrations of traffic outside supermarkets and health-care facilities.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Capture of changing patterns of traffic, pedestrian, and other activity away from the city centre.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale real-time data capture infrastructure may pose privacy risks if data is not anonymized effectively.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction workers being exposed to the virus due to close contact and shared workspaces","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in supply chain and accommodation provision for construction workers","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threats to data validity due to remote data collection","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in identifying precise community transmission rates for meta-regression","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low-cost options for preventing viral transmission","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in designing and carrying out experimental studies in emergency settings","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of experimental research on indoor environmental adjustments and covid-19 outbreaks","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on ipc measures in non-healthcare settings like manufacturing, industrial, essential retail, and public service settings.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Costly workplace closures","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in selecting the most effective ppe","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workplace settings remain a high-risk environment for sars-cov-2 outbreaks","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacy of universal masking in reducing workplace transmission","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staff working across different care homes have a higher risk of sars-cov-2 positivity.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of personal protective equipment ppe leading to increased transmission of covid-19 in meatpacking plants.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective control of sars-cov-2 transmission due to self-washing of masks","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High probability of individuals having a body temperature lower than 37.5°C","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"}]}
